**Input**

text_1 = Drake Disapproves
text_2 = Drake Approves
font_size = Font size (both text_1 and text_2)
 -->
```json
{
  "template_id": "drake-meme",
  "text_1": "TEXT 1 GOES HERE",
  "text_2": "TEXT 2 GOES HERE",
  "font_size": 80
}
```
